name: The Gavel of Judgment
flavorText: A mighty symbol of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice, though never actually used by him. Stolen from the Courts of Justice in the High Heavens by renegade angels.
flavorTextHtml: A mighty symbol of Tyrael, the archangel of Justice, though never actually used by him. Stolen from the Courts of Justice in the High Heavens by renegade angels.

secondary.textHtml: The damage of Hammer of the Ancients is increased by 674% and it returns 25 Fury if it hits 3 or fewer enemies. (Barbarian Only) [600 - 800]%
